ARTICLE.TITLE: Inside PTSD: 'Back to the wall': Veterans of Vietnam, Iraq recall horrors of combat, lingering effects when they came home
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Johnstown, PA (15901)

Today

Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 84F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds light and variable.
